actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to continue for a three-year period the suspension of duties on Trifluoroacetyl-L-Lysine-L-Proline in free base and tosyl salt forms, also known as Tfa Lys Pro in free base and tosyl salt forms.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, for a three-year period beginning on January 1, 1993, the duty on trifluoroacetyl-L-Lysine-L-Proline (Tfa Lys Pro) in free base and tosyl salt forms.

titles.title: A bill to continue for a three-year period the suspension of duties on Trifluoroacetyl-L-Lysine-L-Proline in free base and tosyl salt forms, also known as Tfa Lys Pro in free base and tosyl salt forms.
